FuncDef: This command configures an ANCP name. When ANCP is configured to provide rate adaptation without the use of enhanced subscriber management, this command will define how to map an ANCP key (usually the circuit-id of the DSLAM port) to either a SAP and a scheduler name (when a Multi-Service Site (MSS) is not used) or a customer, site and scheduler name when MSS is used.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the ASCII representation of the DSLAM circuit-id name up to 63 characters.
Specifies the associated existing customer ID. Values-1 to 2147483647.
Specifies the associated customer s configured MSS name, up to 32 characters.
Specifies an existing ANCP policy name up to 32 characters.
Specifies the physical port identifier portion of the SAP definition.
